name: Bridges Run (itch)
description:
In this Casual Arcade game, you build bridges, time it correctly to cross it!

Bridges Run is an exciting endless level-based game in which you  build the bridge. 

Try to move through all the platforms to reach the end of the level, collect coins to unlocks new skins.

 Features:

- Addictive  gameplay

- Many levels

- Unlock Heroes

- Collect coins

- Little storage space

- No internet connection required

- Build Bridges
